analysis_steps.description: Starting file structure and organization analysis

consistency_issues: Mixed use of uppercase and lowercase
Unclear versioning in filenames (part1, part2, etc.)
Underscore vs. space inconsistency in filenames
Numeric prefixes without clear organization (1st, 2nd, etc.)
positive_patterns: Some related files share common prefixes (4thQuery_part*)

recommended_conventions.directories: Create logical directory structure for code organization

modularity_assessment.coupling_analysis: Unknown - all files in a flat structure
modularity_assessment.cohesion_analysis: Poor - related code split across multiple files with unclear relationships

configuration_management.security_assessment: Potential risk - SQL and SAS files may contain hardcoded credentials
recommendations: Extract credentials and connection strings into protected configuration

build_and_deployment.deployment_readiness: Poor - no deployment scripts or documentation
build_and_deployment.testing_structure: Missing - no test files or directories found

improvement_opportunities.action: Create logical directory structure (src/, sql/, sas/, docs/)

improvement_opportunities.impact: Improves code discoverability and project understanding

improvement_opportunities.action: Develop comprehensive README.md with project overview, setup, and usage instructions
improvement_opportunities.impact: Essential for onboarding and project understanding

improvement_opportunities.action: Consolidate fragmented files (e.g., 4thQuery parts) into logical modules
Extract credentials and connection information into configuration files

ideal_structure_suggestion.sql/: All SQL scripts organized by function
